title: PBE store black screen (Help wanted)
body: Yo trying to get all the runes and when i open shop i gain a black screen Please help me.

replies.body: Most of the time those black screens are a good sign that your network is having problems reaching our servers. The client needs to talk with our servers to figure out exactly what it needs to display on the store page, and if it can't reliably reach our servers then it won't know what to show you resulting in a black screen. Hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and run through those steps. Hit me back up if that doesn't help much though!
